method: In a large bowl, combine the chopped cactus, diced avocado, chopped cilantro, lime juice, olive oil, minced garlic, salt, and pepper.
Let the salsa sit for at least 15 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
Serve with tortilla chips or as a topping for tacos or grilled meats.
Enjoy your Cactus and Avocado Salsa!
